name: urlSession(_:webSocketTask:didCloseWith:reason:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the WebSocket task received a close frame from the server endpoint, optionally including a close code and reason from the server.
declaration:
optional func urlSession(_ session: URLSession, 
           webSocketTask: URLSessionWebSocketTask, 
            didCloseWith closeCode: URLSessionWebSocketTask.CloseCode, 
                  reason: Data?)
